DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the kidney function in patients who have received a transplanted kidney and were treated with the combination of sirolimus, daclizumab, mycophenolate and corticosteroids versus transplanted patients treated with cyclosporine, mycophenolate and corticosteroids.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Sirolimus in Kidney Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Kidney transplantation Donor must be at least 60 years old. Current systemic infection Unstable angina or treatment for serious arrhythmia. Cancer within the previous 5 years.
